info: The "in browser" saves are saved in you cache. So be careful if you delete it.

replace.text: Do you want to overwrite this save?

delete.text: Do you want to delete this save?

server.info: Documents you save on the server can be found by all users in the library. If you don't want this, as a patreon supporter you can mark documents as private if your tier allows it.

share.text: Do you want to share this document on reddit (r/DnDHomebrew)
